revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The Sufferings of John Coustos, for Free-Masonry, and for His refusing to turn Roman Catholic, in the Inquisition at Lisbon; Where he was sentenc'd, during Four Year..."
revision.text: Possibly: The Sufferings of John Coustos, for Free-Masonry, and for His refusing to turn Roman Catholic, in the Inquisition at Lisbon; Where he was sentenc'd, during Four Years, to the Galley; and afterwards releas'd from thence by the gracious Interposition of his present Majesty King George II, by John Coustos. (London : Printed by W. Strahan, for the Author, 1746.) http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2413624~S1
